text: Neisosperma sevenetii is a species of flowering plant in the family Apocynaceae. It is endemic to New Caledonia, where it is known from only two sites. Its habitat is threatened with encroachment and fire.Jaffré, T. et al.. 1998. Neisosperma sevenetii. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 1998. Downloaded on 23 September 2015. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of New Caledonia sevenetii Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Neisosperma sevenetii
